Key Match Events: Max Muncy hit a solo home run
Post-Match Reflections: Max Muncy: 'That's not us as a group. We've been good all year. We've come back from games before.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Freddie Freeman exited the game due to discomfort in his ankle
Others: The Dodgers lost Game 2 of the NLDS to the San Diego Padres with a score of 10-2
